name: Blast Lap
description:
Fight to stay in the lead - drop bombs, fire missiles - do whatever it takes to win the race.

Upgrade your car and get get new cars.

Weapons:

  • Machine Guns
  • Rockets
  • Missiles (homing)
  • Land Mines
  • Roller Mines (magnetic)
  • Time bubbles

Please leave some feedback!
